title: U.S. Hiring Stays Robust as Jobless Rate Falls
itunes:title: U.S. Hiring Stays Robust as Jobless Rate Falls
description:
Bloomberg Economics Senior U.S. Economist Yelena Shulyatyeva and Bloomberg News Markets Reporter Abigail Doolittle discuss the economic and market impact of the March nonfarm payrolls report. Peter Quigley, CEO of Kelly, shares his thoughts on the March jobs report and employment trends. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Consumer Reporter Tiffany Kary share the details of Tiffany's Businessweek Magazine story Cashless ATMs Have Grown Into a $7 Billion Marijuana Loophole. Bill Heyn, Co-Founder of SOMA.finance, explains how his platform is helping investors navigate and take advantage of cryptocurrencies. And we Drive to the Close with Cole Smead, Portfolio Manager at Smead Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
